channel.title: 667 hiscores SQL connection
channel.description:
Hello guys, am having trouble with my hiscores, am using Disturbed source. Everytime I log-out appears: Connection to SQL database failed. and I don't know why [b]This is for web[/b] I already portfoward port 3306 on my router page, but when I try to check the port, and this appears:
Could not test port 3306 because some other application has that port locked. Please close any applications that may be using this port and try again.
Hope any can help, cheer
